verbs.description: It [V: must] be a requirement on ABC ’s The View that the hosts create scandals out of nonsense just to have something to whine about . As proof , Friday ’s show began with host Joy Behar complaining about what she called the “ saddest day in the history of the White House , ” ( and surprisingly she did n’t say it was the day Donald Trump was elected ! ) Read more on Newsbusters .
